Write-Up Text: The people had a lot to talk about from everything to Aussie politics to the country's new budget. Federal budgets property schemes and small business tax breaks received attention. Posts were heard calling for more assistance for renters on the solar front while others questioned the effectiveness of incentizing appliance purchases for businesses and instead urged policymakers to prioritize expanding access to solar energy. Amidst all discussions people shared their high standards reminding Australia to seek leadership as good as the days of past prime ministers Hawke and Howard.
